Class SQLiteHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • edu.mills.openstudio.SQLiteHandler

  • class SQLiteHandler
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Handles the creation and opening of user authentication information.
